N, K = map(int, input().split())

# N balls, K colors
# The first ball has K choices, the second ball has K-1 choices, the third ball has K-2 choices, ..., the last ball has 1 choice
print(pow(K, N))

import sys

#read input
n, k = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().rstrip().split())
#print(n, k)

#dp
#dp[0][i] = dp[0][i-1] + dp[1][i-1]
#dp[1][i] = dp[0][i-1]
#dp[i][0] = 1
#dp[i][1] = i

dp = [[0 for j in range(n)] for i in range(2)]

for i in range(n):
    dp[0][i] = 1
    dp[1][i] = i

for i in range(2, k):
    for j in range(1, n):
        dp[i%2][j] = dp[(i-1)%2][j] + dp[i%2][j-1]

print(dp[(k-1)%2][n-1])

import math

n, k = map(int, input().split())

print(int(math.pow(k, n)))
